At the Coffee Shop

Listen to a conversation between a customer and barista at a coffee shop.

Beginner (A1-A2)Conversations

Listening Tips

  • ✓
    Listen to the audio multiple times to catch details you missed the first time.
  • ✓
    Use the 10-second skip buttons to review specific parts of the conversation.
  • ✓
    Try slowing down the audio (0.75x) if you're having trouble understanding.
  • ✓
    Read the questions before listening to know what information to listen for.
